channel.title: [HELP]Need Help With Compiler[HELP]
channel.description:
Okay, recently I've began to make my own server [508], with help from Ploxagescape's owner - Mike, It's came to the stage where I'm going to release it to the public. But, I've got an error, you all know you need to compile after updating so it can register but mine says this;
[b]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/b]
Before you begin to tell me about the [b]CLASSPATH[/b] and [b]PATHS[/b] I've already done it, below I'll show you what the [b]CLASSPATH[/b] and [b]PATH[/b] looks like;
[b]User variables for Owner[/b]
CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%; PATH - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;
[b]System variables[/b]
classpath - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin PATH - %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
[b]I've installed the JDK 6u7, So I'm all up-to-date with the Java's, I've followed almost every TuT guide, but it still doesn't work.[/b]
[i]Post your suggestions for helping me, Thankyou for your time[/i]
[u][b]~Pezza X[/b][/u]
Extra INFO; I want to compile with the Server Manager Compiler for the 508 server's, when I edit it this is what it says;
[b][code]@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pr=%programfiles%\Java\ set javac=%pr%\%jdkver%\bin\javac.exe
REM Put Your Jdk Version Here!
set jdkver=jdk1.6.0_07
REM Put Your Jdk Version Here!
:co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 color %b%%t% :menu cls title 508 Server Manager - Main Menu echo o.O 508 Server Manager V1.5 O.o echo Welcome to the 508 Perfect Compiler - Made By Lukeroge! echo To edit the jdk, edit this file and add your jdk version echo at the top of the file, between the "REM"'S echo. echo Please Choose An Option echo com - Compile your server. echo run - To Run your server. echo exit - To exit out of the program. echo settings - Change the settings of this compiler. echo rsver - View the current runescape version! echo miniguides - View some guides! (Pm Lukeroge On google to suggest a guide) echo (Non Case Sensitive) echo. :option title 508 Server Manager - Main Menu set /p c=Option: if %c%==version goto rsver if %c%==rsver goto rsver if %c%==ccom goto c if %c%==comm goto c if %c%==com goto c if %c%==Com goto c if %c%==miniguides goto miniguides if %c%==Miniguides goto miniguides if %c%==run goto r if %c%==Run goto r if %c%==rrun goto r if %c%==settings goto color if %c%==Settings goto color if %c%==SETTINGS goto color if %c%==clear goto clear if %c%==clear goto clear if %c%==CLEAR goto clear if %c%==exit goto e if %c%==Exit goto e if %c%==* goto er :er echo Invalid Command! goto option :help echo Loading Website. start http://www.google.org goto option :color cls echo Would you like to change the backround color, change echo the text color, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround color. echo text - Change the text color. echo def - Change all colors back to default. echo. echo. set /p color=Option: if %color%==back goto back if %color%==BACK goto back if %color%==text goto text if %color%==TEXT goto text if %color%==def goto co1 if %color%==DEF goto co1 if %color%==* goto er goto er :back cls echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2 :text cls echo Please select a color to change the text to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2 :rsver cd ./Server Manager Files java vercheck goto option :c cls title 508 Server Manager - Compiler echo 508 Dynamic Compiler - By Lukeroge echo Please Choose An Folder To Compile! echo You can use "rs2.io.packets" or "iopackets" or "packets (Most Times)" echo or "io.packets" echo. echo Folder Map: echo rs2: echo rs2.io echo rs2.io.packets echo rs2.net echo rs2.npcs echo rs2.npcs.update echo rs2.players echo rs2.players.combat echo rs2.players.items echo rs2.players.update echo rs2.util echo rs2.world echo rs2.world.items echo rs2.world.mapdata
echo. echo Type exit to return to the main menu or run to run set /p x=Option: if %x%==io goto io if %x%==rs2.io goto io if %x%==Io goto io
if %x%==iopackets goto packets if %x%==io.packets goto packets if %x%==rs2.io.packets goto packets if %x%==packets goto packets if %x%==Packets goto packets
if %x%==run goto r if %x%==Run goto r if %x%==rrun goto r
if %x%==net goto net if %x%==rs2.net goto net
if %x%==npc goto npc if %x%==npcs goto npc if %x%==rs2.npcs goto npc if %x%==Npc goto npc if %x%==Npcs goto npc
if %x%==npcs.update goto npcu if %x%==npcsupdate goto npcu if %x%==rs2.npcs.update goto npcu if %x%==npcupdate goto npcu
if %x%==rs2players goto players if %x%==rs2.players goto players if %x%==Players goto players if %x%==players goto players
if %x%==playerscombat goto playersc if %x%==rs2.players.combat goto playersc if %x%==playercombat goto playersc if %x%==combatplayers goto playersc if %x%==players.combat goto playersc
if %x%==playersitems goto playersi if %x%==rs2.players.items goto playersi if %x%==playeritems goto playersi if %x%==itemsplayers goto playersi if %x%==players.items goto playersi if %x%==playersitem goto playersi
if %x%==playersupdate goto playersu if %x%==rs2.players.update goto playersu if %x%==playerupdate goto playersu if %x%==updateplayers goto playersu if %x%==players.update goto playersu
if %x%==util goto util if %x%==rs2.util goto util if %x%==Util goto util if %x%==rs2util goto util if %x%==util goto utilities
if %x%==rs2world goto world if %x%==rs2.world goto world if %x%==world goto world if %x%==World goto world
if %x%==rs2worlditems goto worldi if %x%==rs2.world.items goto worldi if %x%==world.items goto worldi if %x%==items goto worldi if %x%==worlditems goto worldi
if %x%==rs2worldmapdata goto worldm if %x%==rs2.world.mapdata goto worldm if %x%==world.mapdata goto worldm if %x%==mapdata goto worldm if %x%==worldmapdata goto worldm
if %x%==exit goto menu if %x%==Exit goto menu if %x%==* goto comer goto er
:er echo Invalid Command cls goto c
:io title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Io cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java pause goto c
:packets title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Io.Packets cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java pause goto c
:net title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Net cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java pause goto c
:npc title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Npcs cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/npcs/*.java pause goto c
:npcu title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Npcs.Update cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/npcs/update/*.java pause goto c
:players title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Players cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java pause goto c
:playersi title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Players.Items cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java pause goto c
:playersc title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Players.Combat cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java pause goto c
:playersu title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Players.Update cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java pause goto c
:util title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.Util cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java pause goto c
:world title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.World cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/*.java pause goto c
:worldi title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.World.Items cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/*.java pause goto c
:worldm title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling) echo Compiling Rs2.World.Mapdata cd ../src @echo off "%javac%" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/*.java pause goto c
:clear cls goto menu
:miniguides cls title 508 Server Manager - Miniguides echo Welcome To The Miniguides Section! echo Here Are Some Useful Guides For Your Server! echo. echo Please Choose An Guide echo Basics: echo Mod - How to make players mods or admins! echo.
:minig set /p b=Option: if %b%==mod goto mod if %b%==Mod goto mod if %b%==od goto mod if %b%==mmod goto mod :er echo Invalid Command! goto minig :mod cls title 508 Server Manager - Basic Miniguides - Mod Guide echo Mod Making Miniguide - Basic echo How To Make People Mods Of Admins! echo. echo fgdgdfgdffsnoobfvfgvdoiturselfeger echo. echo Type Done To Return to Menu set /p mod=Command: if %mod%==exit goto miniguides goto miniguides :r start run.cmd title 508 Server Manager - Server Running echo Starting Server - Type Clear To Clear This Message goto option[/code]
If anything is wrong with the compiler it self please make a note whilst posting about the over issue.
Also~ If there's anything wrong with the CLASSPATH or PATH please tell me what to replace, I really need this cleared up so I can get ASAP.
~Pezza X

item.title: [HELP]Need Help With Compiler[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @pure_wc1994 pure wc1994
item.description:
@pure_wc1994 wrote:

[quote=“MoparScaperDude, post:2, topic:235654”]LOL at the fake “URGENT”

Anyways, edit the bat and fix the path.[/quote]

What do I need to put instead then, Thankyou.

~Pezza X[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 09:56:49 am[/size][hr]Anyone at all want to help me?

~Pezza X[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 11:50:49 am[/size][hr]C’mon people, I need help here

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]Need Help With Compiler[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @pure_wc1994 pure wc1994
item.description:
@pure_wc1994 wrote:

Okay, recently I’ve began to make my own server [508], with help from Ploxagescape’s owner - Mike, It’s came to the stage where I’m going to release it to the public. But, I’ve got an error, you all know you need to compile after updating so it can register but mine says this;

The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .

Before you begin to tell me about the CLASSPATH and PATHS I’ve already done it, below I’ll show you what the CLASSPATH and PATH looks like;

User variables for Owner

CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
PATH - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;

System variables

classpath - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
PATH - %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin

I’ve installed the JDK 6u7, So I’m all up-to-date with the Java’s, I’ve followed almost every TuT guide, but it still doesn’t work.

Post your suggestions for helping me, Thankyou for your time

~Pezza X

Extra INFO; I want to compile with the Server Manager Compiler for the 508 server’s, when I edit it this is what it says;

[b][code]@echo off
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java” set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pr=%programfiles%\Java
set javac=%pr%%jdkver%\bin\javac.exe

REM Put Your Jdk Version Here!

set jdkver=jdk1.6.0_07

REM Put Your Jdk Version Here!

:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
color %b%%t%
:menu
cls
title 508 Server Manager - Main Menu
echo o.O 508 Server Manager V1.5 O.o
echo Welcome to the 508 Perfect Compiler - Made By Lukeroge!
echo To edit the jdk, edit this file and add your jdk version
echo at the top of the file, between the “REM”'S
echo.
echo Please Choose An Option
echo com - Compile your server.
echo run - To Run your server.
echo exit - To exit out of the program.
echo settings - Change the settings of this compiler.
echo rsver - View the current runescape version!
echo miniguides - View some guides! (Pm Lukeroge On google to suggest a guide)
echo (Non Case Sensitive)
echo.
:option
title 508 Server Manager - Main Menu
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==version goto rsver
if %c%==rsver goto rsver
if %c%==ccom goto c
if %c%==comm goto c
if %c%==com goto c
if %c%==Com goto c
if %c%==miniguides goto miniguides
if %c%==Miniguides goto miniguides
if %c%==run goto r
if %c%==Run goto r
if %c%==rrun goto r
if %c%==settings goto color
if %c%==Settings goto color
if %c%==SETTINGS goto color
if %c%==clear goto clear
if %c%==clear goto clear
if %c%==CLEAR goto clear
if %c%==exit goto e
if %c%==Exit goto e
if %c%==* goto er
:er
echo Invalid Command!
goto option
:help
echo Loading Website.
start http://www.google.org
goto option
:color
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround color, change
echo the text color, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround color.
echo text - Change the text color.
echo def - Change all colors back to default.
echo.
echo.
set /p color=Option:
if %color%==back goto back
if %color%==BACK goto back
if %color%==text goto text
if %color%==TEXT goto text
if %color%==def goto co1
if %color%==DEF goto co1
if %color%==* goto er
goto er
:back
cls
echo Please select a color to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2
:text
cls
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:rsver
cd ./Server Manager Files
java vercheck
goto option
:c
cls
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler
echo 508 Dynamic Compiler - By Lukeroge
echo Please Choose An Folder To Compile!
echo You can use “rs2.io.packets” or “iopackets” or “packets (Most Times)”
echo or “io.packets”
echo.
echo Folder Map:
echo rs2:
echo rs2.io
echo rs2.io.packets
echo rs2.net
echo rs2.npcs
echo rs2.npcs.update
echo rs2.players
echo rs2.players.combat
echo rs2.players.items
echo rs2.players.update
echo rs2.util
echo rs2.world
echo rs2.world.items
echo rs2.world.mapdata

echo.
echo Type exit to return to the main menu or run to run
set /p x=Option:
if %x%==io goto io
if %x%==rs2.io goto io
if %x%==Io goto io

if %x%==iopackets goto packets
if %x%==io.packets goto packets
if %x%==rs2.io.packets goto packets
if %x%==packets goto packets
if %x%==Packets goto packets

if %x%==run goto r
if %x%==Run goto r
if %x%==rrun goto r

if %x%==net goto net
if %x%==rs2.net goto net

if %x%==npc goto npc
if %x%==npcs goto npc
if %x%==rs2.npcs goto npc
if %x%==Npc goto npc
if %x%==Npcs goto npc

if %x%==npcs.update goto npcu
if %x%==npcsupdate goto npcu
if %x%==rs2.npcs.update goto npcu
if %x%==npcupdate goto npcu

if %x%==rs2players goto players
if %x%==rs2.players goto players
if %x%==Players goto players
if %x%==players goto players

if %x%==playerscombat goto playersc
if %x%==rs2.players.combat goto playersc
if %x%==playercombat goto playersc
if %x%==combatplayers goto playersc
if %x%==players.combat goto playersc

if %x%==playersitems goto playersi
if %x%==rs2.players.items goto playersi
if %x%==playeritems goto playersi
if %x%==itemsplayers goto playersi
if %x%==players.items goto playersi
if %x%==playersitem goto playersi

if %x%==playersupdate goto playersu
if %x%==rs2.players.update goto playersu
if %x%==playerupdate goto playersu
if %x%==updateplayers goto playersu
if %x%==players.update goto playersu

if %x%==util goto util
if %x%==rs2.util goto util
if %x%==Util goto util
if %x%==rs2util goto util
if %x%==util goto utilities

if %x%==rs2world goto world
if %x%==rs2.world goto world
if %x%==world goto world
if %x%==World goto world

if %x%==rs2worlditems goto worldi
if %x%==rs2.world.items goto worldi
if %x%==world.items goto worldi
if %x%==items goto worldi
if %x%==worlditems goto worldi

if %x%==rs2worldmapdata goto worldm
if %x%==rs2.world.mapdata goto worldm
if %x%==world.mapdata goto worldm
if %x%==mapdata goto worldm
if %x%==worldmapdata goto worldm

if %x%==exit goto menu
if %x%==Exit goto menu
if %x%==* goto comer
goto er

:er
echo Invalid Command
cls
goto c

:io
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Io
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java
pause
goto c

:packets
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Io.Packets
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java
pause
goto c

:net
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Net
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java
pause
goto c

:npc
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Npcs
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/npcs/*.java
pause
goto c

:npcu
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Npcs.Update
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/npcs/update/*.java
pause
goto c

:players
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Players
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java
pause
goto c

:playersi
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Players.Items
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java
pause
goto c

:playersc
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Players.Combat
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java
pause
goto c

:playersu
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Players.Update
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java
pause
goto c

:util
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.Util
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java
pause
goto c

:world
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.World
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/*.java
pause
goto c

:worldi
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.World.Items
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/*.java
pause
goto c

:worldm
title 508 Server Manager - Compiler (Currently Compiling)
echo Compiling Rs2.World.Mapdata
cd …/src
@echo off
“%javac%” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/*.java
pause
goto c

:clear
cls
goto menu

:miniguides
cls
title 508 Server Manager - Miniguides
echo Welcome To The Miniguides Section!
echo Here Are Some Useful Guides For Your Server!
echo.
echo Please Choose An Guide
echo Basics:
echo Mod - How to make players mods or admins!
echo.

:minig
set /p b=Option:
if %b%==mod goto mod
if %b%==Mod goto mod
if %b%==od goto mod
if %b%==mmod goto mod
:er
echo Invalid Command!
goto minig
:mod
cls
title 508 Server Manager - Basic Miniguides - Mod Guide
echo Mod Making Miniguide - Basic
echo How To Make People Mods Of Admins!
echo.
echo fgdgdfgdffsnoobfvfgvdoiturselfeger
echo.
echo Type Done To Return to Menu
set /p mod=Command:
if %mod%==exit goto miniguides
goto miniguides
:r
start run.cmd
title 508 Server Manager - Server Running
echo Starting Server - Type Clear To Clear This Message
goto option[/code]

If anything is wrong with the compiler it self please make a note whilst posting about the over issue.

Also~ If there’s anything wrong with the CLASSPATH or PATH please tell me what to replace, I really need this cleared up so I can get ASAP.

~Pezza X

Read full topic
